embed.title: Party Command
embed.description: Parties are for going into adventures with your friends!

fields.name: .party invite <@user>
fields.value: Invite a player to a party

fields.name: .party join <@user>
fields.value: Join a party with the party leader's @

fields.name: .party leave
fields.value: Leave the current party you are in

fields.name: .party kick <@user>
fields.value: Kick a player from your party
